reviewText: Beautiful musical for young and old!! I wish it also would be released on DVD in English, how I watched and enjoyed this movie in Europe (1980 or so), titled "Rock 'n Roll Wolf". The songs in English -same music of the Russian version :) - are very catchy... you WILL sing along! However, if you know Grimm's fairy tale "The Wolf and the Seven Kids", it easy to follow the story along. Good experience for children to watch a movie in a different language. Hats off to all actors (the children are adorable), Moscow's Ice Ballet, and last but not least: the Russian Popov, gone to soon but not forgotten!!
Rock n roll wolf, memories from childhood, however quality is weird, interlacer did not really help.
very good musical movieI was looking for this title. a long time ago. Thanks. Even if there's no english or french track.
This is a fantastic movie musical for family with small children.

This film is loved in Russia!
It's based on the folk tale about Mama Goat who leaves her baby goats at home alone. That's when the bad guy, Wolf, will try to get them!
This DVD is entirely in Russian, filled with music and songs, and is so much fun to watch with your kids, starting with toddlers.
Keep in mind, however, that there are no English subtitles.

Popular Russian actors - Lyudmila Gurchenko and Mikhail Boyarsky - appear as main characters!

I've seen this movie countless times and never grow tired.
I don't know why I enjoy this movie/musical so much, but I can watch it every day.

I don't speak Russian but it doesn't mater.

This Musical is pure magic.

It is what I would like for heaven to be like:
Strange, funky, sexy and filed with carnival animals with tights, bad teeth and amazing singing voices.

/ Daniel
Mama / Mother / Mummy / Rock'n Roll Wolf [All Regions] [NTSC] Creative and wonderful production gives you a lot of pleasant moments and fun. Very good for kids

I received this product and was really disapointed to see that it was in Russian only.  The film was what I wanted but since the title was translated in English I expected the movie to at least be in that language.  Very disapointing for the price.
